IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: PROVIDE BEHAVIORAL HEALTH SERVICES TO CLIENTS LOCATED IN MIDDLE AND EAST TENNESSEE
IRS990.MissionDesc: PROVIDE BEHAVIORAL HEALTH SERVICES TO CLIENTS LOCATED IN MIDDLE AND EAST TENNESSEE
IRS990.Desc: MEDICAL SERVICES - VOLUNTEER PROVIDES PSYCHIATRIC EVALUATIONS AND MEDICATION MANAGEMENT SERVICES PERFORMED BY MD'S AND NURSE PRACTITIONERS FOR POPULATION GROUPS SERVED WITHIN THE VOLUNTEER SYSTEM.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: CASE MANAGEMENT CARE COORDINATION - CASE MANAGEMENT IS A SERIES OF ACTIONS TAKEN WHOSE MAJOR RESPONSIBILITIES ARE TO HELP A CLIENT MAKE INFORMED CHOICES, TO ASSURE TIMELY AND COST-EFFECTIVE ACCESS TO QUALITY SERVICES, AND TO HELP A CLIENT TO MAKE AND/OR TAKE ADVANTAGE OF OPPORTUNITIES FOR GROWTH AND PERSONAL ENHANCEMENT. CASE MANAGERS HELP TO ARRANGE PROVISION OF MEDICAL, CRISIS, VOCATIONAL AND HOUSING SERVICES AS NEEDED. SERVICES INCLUDE IDENTIFYING NEEDS AND STRENGTHS, DEVELOPING SHORT AND LONG TERM GOALS AND ASSISTING TO ACCESS SERVICES REQUIRED TO ACCOMPLISH THOSE GOALS. CASE MANAGEMENT IS PROVIDED THROUGHOUT THE VOLUNTEER SYSTEM.

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: OUTPATIENT SERVICES - OUTPATIENT SERVICES INCLUDE SEVERAL TREATMENT COMPONENTS. INDIVIDUAL, FAMILY AND COUPLES THERAPY IS AVAILABLE AS PART OF OUTPATIENT SERVICES THROUGHOUT THE VOLUNTEER SYSTEM. VOLUNTEER HAS CLINICAL STAFF TRAINED IN FAMILY THERAPY AS WELL AS EXPERTISE IN TREATMENT OF MARITAL AND RELATIONSHIP ISSUES. INDIVIDUAL THERAPY IS AVAILABLE FOR CHILDREN, ADOLESCENTS AND ADULTS. SPECIALIZED GROUP THERAPY IS AVAILABLE AT SEVERAL LOCATIONS. THESE INCLUDE GROUPS ADDRESSING ATTENTION DEFICIT HYPERACTIVITY DISORDER, DEPRESSION, ANGER MANAGEMENT AND SEXUAL OFFENDER TREATMENT.

ProgSrvcAccomActyOtherGrp.Desc: THE ORGANIZATION PROVIDES ALCOHOL AND DRUG ABUSE PREVENTION AND TREATMENT, DIAGNOSTIC EVALUATIONS, TREATMENT AND FOLLOW UP CARE FOR CLIENTS FROM LOCATIONS COVERING 31 COUNTIES IN MIDDLE AND EAST TENNESSEE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: VOLUNTEER IS THE CUSTODIAN OF AND MANAGES FUNDS FOR RESIDENTS LIVING IN GROUP HOMES.

VOLUNTEER RECOGNIZES A TAX POSITION AS A BENEFIT ONLY IF IT IS "MORE LIKELY THAN NOT" THAT THE TAX POSITION WOULD BE SUSTAINED IN A TAX EXAMINATION, WITH A TAX EXAMINATION BEING PRESUMED TO OCCUR. THE AMOUNT RECOGNIZED IS THE LARGEST AMOUNT OF TAX BENEFIT THAT IS GREATER THAN 50% LIKELY OF BEING REALIZED ON EXAMINATION. FOR TAX POSITIONS NOT MEETING THE "MORE LIKELY THAN NOT" TEST, NO TAX BENEFIT IS RECORDED. AS OF JUNE 30, 2018, VOLUNTEER HAS ACCRUED NO INTEREST OR PENALTIES RELATED TO UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS. IT IS VOLUNTEER'S POLICY TO RECOGNIZE INTEREST AND/OR PENALTIES RELATED TO INCOME TAX MATTERS IN INCOME TAX EXPENSE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE VP OF FINANCE PRESENTS THE COMPLETED FORM 990 TO THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS DURING AN OPEN MEETING. THE BOARD FORMALLY APPROVES THE FORM 990 FOR SUBMISSION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: CONFLICT OF INTEREST FORMS ARE COMPLETED ANNUALLY AND ANY CONFLICTS ARE DISCLOSED. IF A SUBJECT COMES BEFORE A VOTE OF THE BOARD AND A CONFLICT OFINTEREST EXISTS FOR A BOARD MEMBER, THE MEMBER DOES NOT VOTE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: 15A - THE CEO'S SALARY IS SET BY CONTRACT APPROVED BY THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS. THE BOARD COMPLETES AN ANNUAL EVALUATION OF PERFORMANCE AS A BASIS FOR CONTINUED EMPLOYMENT. 15B - OFFICERS AND KEY EMPLOYEES' SALARIES ARE REVIEWED AND APPROVED ANNUALLY BY THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION MAKES ITS GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY, AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AVAILABLE TO PUBLIC UPON REQUEST.

DisregardedEntityName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: KNIGHTS OF COLUMBUS HOME OF COWAN

OtherOrganizationName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: PART II ARE PAID BY VOLUNTEER
